trans-unit.source: Iterates over all following sibling content nodes.
trans-unit.target: 다음 모든 형제 콘텐츠 노드를 반복합니다.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 경우에만 탐색기 변경의 상태는 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.MoveNext%2A>메서드가 반환 되었음을 `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing the child content nodes.
trans-unit.target: 자식 콘텐츠 노드 트래버스를 시작 하는 노드.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
trans-unit.target: 이름에 따라 노드를 필터링 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 경우에만 탐색기 변경의 상태는 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.MoveNext%2A>메서드가 반환 되었음을 `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next sibling content node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 형제 콘텐츠 노드로에 반복기를 배치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the next sibling content node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MoveNext 메서드를 설정 하는 다음 형제 콘텐츠 노드로 있으면는 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.Current%2A>속성을 현재 결과 탐색기입니다; 그렇지 않으면는 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.Current%2A>속성 변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.FollowingSiblingIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next sibling content node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>다음 형제 콘텐츠 노드로 있으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
